sourcesContent:
import { memo } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './PostDetailForum.scss' import { typePostEnglish, typePostVietnamese } from '../../Languages/ListPostForum' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/PostDetailForum' function PostDetailForum({ languageSelected }) { const post = useLocation().state.post const languageTypePost = languageSelected === 'EN' ? typePostEnglish : typePostVietnamese const languageList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese const handleClickBtnReply = (id) => { const element = document.getElementById(id) if (element.style.display === 'block') { element.style.display = 'none' } else { element.style.display = 'block' const position = element.getBoundingClientRect() window.scroll(position) } } return (
{languageTypePost[parseInt(post.topic) - 1].label.toUpperCase()}
{post.title}
{post.description}
{post.comment.map((comment, index) => (
{comment.name}
{comment.createDate}
{comment.content}
handleClickBtnReply(`reply-input-${index}`)}>{languageList.txtReply}
{comment.reply.map((reply) => (
{reply.name}
{reply.createDate}
{reply.content}
))}
))}
) } export default memo(PostDetailForum)
